name: FieldLabel
description: A field label provides accessible labelling for form elements. Use the for attribute to outline the id of an element in the same DOM tree to which it should associate itself.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Whether the field label appears in a disabled state

attributes.name: for
attributes.description: The ID of the form element that this label is associated with

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the field label element

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Whether the field label indicates a required field

attributes.name: side-aligned
attributes.description: Controls the alignment of the label when displayed inline with the form control

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: The size of the field label

examples.title: Basic Field Label
examples.description: A simple field label associated with a form control
examples.code:
<sp-field-label for="textfield">Life Story</sp-field-label>
<sp-textfield id="textfield" placeholder="Enter your life story"></sp-textfield>

examples.title: Required Field Label
examples.description: A field label indicating a required field
examples.code:
<sp-field-label for="textfield" required>Life Story</sp-field-label>
<sp-textfield id="textfield" placeholder="Enter your life story"></sp-textfield>

examples.title: Side-Aligned Start Field Label
examples.description: A field label displayed inline with start alignment
examples.code:
<sp-field-label for="textfield" side-aligned="start" style="width: 120px">Life Story</sp-field-label>
<sp-textfield id="textfield" placeholder="Enter your life story"></sp-textfield>

examples.title: Side-Aligned End Field Label
examples.description: A field label displayed inline with end alignment
examples.code:
<sp-field-label for="textfield" side-aligned="end" style="width: 120px">Life Story</sp-field-label>
<sp-textfield id="textfield" placeholder="Enter your life story"></sp-textfield>

examples.title: Small Field Label
examples.description: A field label with small size
examples.code:
<sp-field-label for="textfield" size="s">Life Story</sp-field-label>
<sp-textfield id="textfield" placeholder="Enter your life story"></sp-textfield>

examples.title: Large Field Label
examples.description: A field label with large size
examples.code:
<sp-field-label for="textfield" size="l">Life Story</sp-field-label>
<sp-textfield id="textfield" placeholder="Enter your life story"></sp-textfield>
